serverName.title: Clan Name
serverName.errorMessage: Please enter a valid clan name (max 64 characters, only words, numbers, _ or -).
serverName.duplicateNameMessage: The clan name already exists. Please enter another name.

inactive.title: Inactive Settings
inactive.description: Automatically move members to this channel and mute them when they have been idle for longer than the inactive timeout. This does not affect browsers.

systemMessage.title: System Message Settings
systemMessage.description: This is the channel we send system event messages to. These can be turned off at any time.
systemMessage.sendRandomWelcome: Send a random welcome messages when someone joins this clan.
systemMessage.promptMembersReply: Prompt members to reply to welcome messages with a sticker.
systemMessage.sendMessageBoost: Send a messages when someone boosts this clan
systemMessage.sendHelpfulTips: Send helpful tips for clan setup

defaultNotification.title: Default Notification Settings
defaultNotification.description: This will determine whether members who have not explicitly set their notification settings receive notification for every messages sent in this server or not. We highly recommend setting this to only @mentions for community clan
